item.title: Aspose.Words for Reporting Services 22.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for Reporting Services 22.11. Note: Starting from “Aspose.Words for Reporting Services 23.02” obsolete versions for the following components will be no longer supported: Microsoft SQL Server 2008/2008 R2 Reporting Services. Full List of Issues Covering all Changes in this Release Key Summary Category Upgrade to the latest version of Aspose.
